attributes.action: repeal the edict that gives MPs the right to be given military rank and wear medals after a short visit to a war zone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Giving this  right to MPs demeans and devalues the service of long service soldiers who have fought in these campaigns and put their lives on the line in defence of this country and our freedoms

rejection.details: I can confirm that it is not true that MPs have the right to be given military rank or wear medals after a short visit to a war zone.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
